zh-cn: O Corpo de Polícia de Macau
en: Corpo de Polícia de Segurança Pública

description.zh-cn: 澳门特别行政区政府保安司辖下的局级政府部门，负责维持公共安全，维护公共及私人财产。其历史可追溯至1691年，1999年澳门主权移交后由治安警察厅改称治安警察局。
description.en: A bureau-level government department under the Secretariat for Security of the Macao SAR Government, responsible for maintaining public safety and protecting public and private property. Its history dates back to 1691, and it was renamed from the Public Security Police Department to the Public Security Police Force after the handover of Macau's sovereignty in 1999.

description.zh-cn: 澳门特别行政区政府五个司级部门之一，负责澳门的内部保安及纪律部队。
description.en: One of the five secretariats of the Macao SAR Government, responsible for Macau's internal security and disciplinary forces.

description.zh-cn: 澳门特别行政区政府保安司辖下的部门，负责统一指挥澳门特别行政区治安警察局及司法警察局。
description.en: A department under the Secretariat for Security of the Macao SAR Government, responsible for the unified command of the Public Security Police Force and the Judiciary Police of the Macao SAR.

description.zh-cn: 澳门治安警察局现任局长。
description.en: The current Commissioner of the Public Security Police Force of Macau.

description.zh-cn: 澳门政治人物，曾任治安警察局局长及警察总局局长。
description.en: A Macanese political figure, former Commissioner of the Public Security Police Force and former Commissioner General of the Unitary Police Service.

description.zh-cn: 澳门政治人物，曾任治安警察局局长及警察总局局长。
description.en: A Macanese political figure, former Commissioner of the Public Security Police Force and former Commissioner General of the Unitary Police Service.

description.zh-cn: 澳门政治人物，曾任治安警察局局长。
description.en: A Macanese political figure, former Commissioner of the Public Security Police Force.

description.zh-cn: 澳门政治人物，曾任治安警察厅厅长、治安警察局局长及警察总局局长。
description.en: A Macanese political figure, former head of the Public Security Police Department, Commissioner of the Public Security Police Force, and Commissioner General of the Unitary Police Service.

nodes.id: 第1/2001号法律《澳门特别行政区警察总局》

zh-cn: 第1/2001号法律《澳门特别行政区警察总局》

description.zh-cn: 订定澳门特别行政区警察总局成立及其职权的法律文件。
description.en: The legal document that established the Unitary Police Service of the Macao Special Administrative Region and defined its powers.

nodes.id: 澳门特别行政区政府司法警察局

zh-cn: 澳门特别行政区政府司法警察局

description.zh-cn: 澳门特别行政区政府保安司司长负责的刑事警察机关。
description.en: The criminal investigation police agency under the Secretary for Security of the Macao SAR Government.

description.zh-cn: 澳门特别行政区的反贪腐机构。
description.en: The anti-corruption agency of the Macao Special Administrative Region.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的两个特别行政区之一。
description.en: One of the two special administrative regions of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 治安警察局是澳门特别行政区政府保安司辖下的局级政府部门。
description.en: The Public Security Police Force is a bureau-level government department under the Secretariat for Security of the Macao SAR Government.

description.zh-cn: 自2001年警察总局成立起，治安警察局由其统一指挥。
description.en: Since the establishment of the Unitary Police Service in 2001, the Public Security Police Force has been under its unified command.

description.zh-cn: 2019年12月20日被行政长官提名为警察总局局长。
description.en: Nominated by the Chief Executive as the Commissioner General of the Unitary Police Service on December 20, 2019.

description.zh-cn: 2014年12月19日后被行政长官提名为警察总局局长。
description.en: Nominated by the Chief Executive as the Commissioner General of the Unitary Police Service after December 19, 2014.

description.zh-cn: 其任期跨越澳门回归，职位由治安警察厅厅长变为治安警察局局长。
description.en: His tenure spanned the handover of Macau, during which his title changed from Director of the Public Security Police Department to Commissioner of the Public Security Police Force.

description.zh-cn: 2001年9月16日后被行政长官提名为警察总局局长。
description.en: Nominated by the Chief Executive as the Commissioner General of the Unitary Police Service after September 16, 2001.

relationships.source: 第1/2001号法律《澳门特别行政区警察总局》

description.zh-cn: 该法律的公布标志着警察总局的正式成立。
description.en: The promulgation of this law marked the official establishment of the Unitary Police Service.

relationships.source: 澳门特别行政区政府司法警察局

description.zh-cn: 2014年12月，司法警察局揭发并拘捕一名治安警察局特警队员，其涉嫌以不雅照片要胁及奸淫多名未成年女性，对治安警察局的声誉造成负面影响。
description.en: In December 2014, the Judiciary Police uncovered and arrested a special police officer of the Public Security Police Force for allegedly blackmailing and sexually assaulting several underage females with indecent photos, negatively impacting the reputation of the Public Security Police Force.

description.zh-cn: 2015年4月，澳门廉政公署揭发两名治安警察局交通厅警员故意错误开出罚单以包庇同僚，涉嫌伪造及渎职罪，对治安警察局的声誉造成负面影响。
description.en: In April 2015, the Macau Commission Against Corruption exposed two traffic police officers of the Public Security Police Force for deliberately issuing incorrect tickets to cover for a colleague, on suspicion of forgery and dereliction of duty, negatively impacting the reputation of the Public Security Police Force.
